participant_1.background:
I love getting my favorite coffee from Starbucks after a long day at the lab.
i cannot get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth.
I watch CSI to take my mind off things.
I am not sure what my ethnic background is
I started working for myself so I could be more flexible with my time and still be able to take care of my toddler.

participant_2.background:
I have difficulty expressing my feelings to others.
i love chocolate cake with extra frosting.
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.
My home videos are a source of comfort and nostalgia, and they help me to stay positive even when things are tough.
i would rather stay up late than get up early.

content.text: Hi there, how's your day going?
It's going well, thanks! How about yours?
It's going well too! I just got home from working in the lab. I'm really tired, but I'm also pretty excited because I'm going to watch CSI tonight.
CSI is my favorite show! I love how it's so suspenseful and always keeps me on the edge of my seat.
Me too! I love the characters and the storylines are always so interesting.
It's hard to say, but I think I'd have to say the one where the killer was a serial killer who was targeting people who were related to him.
Oh yeah, that was a really good one! I loved how the team finally caught him.
Me too! It was so satisfying to see him get what he deserved.
I'm not sure yet. I might go out with friends or just relax at home.
Sounds like a good plan! I'm going to go out with friends tomorrow.
